body: Your contract for 15 Heritage Halls #2101 is ending on April 24. Make sure to be fully moved out by 10:00 AM.
subject: Contract Ending
Waiting List Request Received
body: This message is to confirm that your waiting list request has been received for Wymount Terrace Options: 1 Bedroom, 2 Bedroom.

subject: Waiting list inquiry
body: Hello. I recently completed a waiting list request. I was wondering if there is any way that I could know my position? Just so that I can better plan where I will live. Thanks!
